item.title: Emacs Configuration File
item.description: Emacs Configuration Here is the compulsory screenshot of my Emacs setup and this page being edited. Below I have presented the main parts of my configuration which might be of interest. Initialize Load melpa and custom packages. Here I also load ox-rss which is later used to generate the rss feed for this blog. (package-initialize) ;; load emacs 24's package system. Add MELPA repository. (when (>= emacs-major-version 24) (require 'package) (add-to-list 'package-archives '("melpa" .
